response.explain: The previous action code has successfully executed the subtask of grasping the strawberry from the tray. The robot now has the strawberry in its inventory. The next step is to move the robot to the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Grasp the apple.
(4) Move the robot to the fridge.
(5) Put the apple inside the fridge.
(6) Move the robot to the tray.
(7) Grasp the strawberry from the tray.
(8) Move the robot to the fridge.
(9) Put the strawberry inside the fridge.
(10) Close the fridge.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 8: Move the robot to the fridge
    fridge = registry(env, "fridge_xyejdx_0")
    MoveBot(env, robot, fridge, camera)
    donothing(env)
